author: suresht
msg: 1) prevents configuring a database for encryption or encryption with new
key while restoring from backup using connection URL attributes createFrom/
2) Modified the re-encryption crash recovery test to perform (re)encryption  while
recovering from a previous crash with same attributes.
3) Minor cleanup in  RawStore.java related to re-encryption.

author: jdillon
msg: Moved common lib, lib/endorsed setup to geronimo-boilerplate-minimal
Removed uneeded jar deps from all assemblies
Moved commons schema extraction to geronimo-boilerplate-minimal, only jetty or tomcat schema extraction done in assemblies
Added hot deployer dep to minimal assemblies so they can boot properly
